activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#4233
activity.text:
@khavinshankar , @nihal467  While writing the test for new patient creation, I encountered the following error.

Even after typing the phone number when we click on Add Patient button, we get the following error:

![Screenshot from 2023-05-26 19-55-23](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/86483059/12b4159f-724c-4c74-a49e-9c300baa98ea)

We can clearly see that the phone number typed is a valid one.

I tried debugging this and logged the input value we are getting from the form. The value we get is something like: "919994565656" and when we try to take out the phone number from this input we get an undefined value. One strange is if I edit anything when the test is paused and again try to submit the form, this time we get "+91 956465656" (notice the + sign and gap) and we are able to successfully retrieve the phone number from it using `parsePhoneNumberFromString` method. Check out the screenshot for more info:

![Screenshot from 2023-05-26 20-02-09](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/86483059/29a07702-a061-4ef2-866b-c698d77810f1)

The first set of console values are when the phone numbers are typed using cypress, the next one is when I tried editing one of them and re submit the form.

Can anyone of you please take a look at this. Thanks!

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#4233
activity.text:
@khavinshankar I would like to work on this issue, can you please assign me this task?
Thank You!

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#4133
activity.text: @nihal467  All the unclaimed tasks depend on the open PRs like adding, and editing consultation can only be done after creating patients, and configuration of the assets page can be done after creating an asset. So can I take those tasks which are already assigned (creating an asset) as the PR seems stale now?
